name: beechnut
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the nut of a beech (= a tree with a smooth, grey trunk): The chef toasted some beechnuts to use in the sauce. If you are thinking of foraging for wild food, don't overlook beechnuts, which are plentiful and wholesome.
More examplesFewer examplesI used to collect beechnuts when I was a boy on my way to school.Our feet crunched over the carpet of beechnuts lying on the forest floor.Beechnuts are a core part of a bear's diet.
